00025 /* LNet is allocated failure locations 0xe000 to 0xffff */
00026 
00027 /* GNILND has 0xf0XX */
00028 #define CFS_FAIL_GNI                    0xf000
00029 #define CFS_FAIL_GNI_PHYS_MAP           0xf001
00030 #define CFS_FAIL_GNI_VIRT_MAP           0xf002
00031 #define CFS_FAIL_GNI_GET_UNMAP          0xf003
00032 #define CFS_FAIL_GNI_PUT_UNMAP          0xf004
00033 #define CFS_FAIL_GNI_MAP_TX             0xf005
00034 #define CFS_FAIL_GNI_SMSG_SEND          0xf006
00035 #define CFS_FAIL_GNI_CLOSE_SEND         0xf007
00036 #define CFS_FAIL_GNI_CDM_CREATE         0xf008
00037 #define CFS_FAIL_GNI_CDM_DESTROY        0xf009
00038 #define CFS_FAIL_GNI_CDM_ATTACH         0xf00a
00039 #define CFS_FAIL_GNI_CQ_CREATE          0xf00b
00040 #define CFS_FAIL_GNI_CQ_DESTROY         0xf00c
00041 #define CFS_FAIL_GNI_EP_BIND            0xf00d
00042 #define CFS_FAIL_GNI_EP_UNBIND          0xf00e
00043 #define CFS_FAIL_GNI_EP_SET_EVDATA      0xf00f
00044 #define CFS_FAIL_GNI_SMSG_INIT          0xf010
00045 #define CFS_FAIL_GNI_SMSG_RELEASE       0xf011
00046 #define CFS_FAIL_GNI_POST_RDMA          0xf012
00047 #define CFS_FAIL_GNI_GET_COMPLETED      0xf013
00048 #define CFS_FAIL_GNI_EP_DESTROY         0xf015
00049 #define CFS_FAIL_GNI_VIRT_UNMAP         0xf016
00050 #define CFS_FAIL_GNI_MDD_RELEASE        0xf017
00051 #define CFS_FAIL_GNI_NOOP_SEND          0xf018
00052 #define CFS_FAIL_GNI_ERR_SUBSCRIBE      0xf01a
00053 #define CFS_FAIL_GNI_QUIESCE_RACE       0xf01b
00054 #define CFS_FAIL_GNI_DG_TERMINATE       0xf01c
00055 #define CFS_FAIL_GNI_REG_QUIESCE        0xf01d
00056 #define CFS_FAIL_GNI_IN_QUIESCE         0xf01e
00057 #define CFS_FAIL_GNI_DELAY_RDMA         0xf01f
00058 #define CFS_FAIL_GNI_SR_DOWN_RACE       0xf020
00059 #define CFS_FAIL_GNI_ALLOC_TX           0xf021
00060 #define CFS_FAIL_GNI_FMABLK_AVAIL       0xf022
00061 #define CFS_FAIL_GNI_EP_CREATE          0xf023
00062 #define CFS_FAIL_GNI_CQ_GET_EVENT       0xf024
00063 #define CFS_FAIL_GNI_PROBE              0xf025
00064 #define CFS_FAIL_GNI_EP_TEST            0xf026
00065 #define CFS_FAIL_GNI_CONNREQ_DROP       0xf027
00066 #define CFS_FAIL_GNI_CONNREQ_PROTO      0xf028
00067 #define CFS_FAIL_GNI_CONND_PILEUP       0xf029
00068 #define CFS_FAIL_GNI_PHYS_SETUP         0xf02a
00069 #define CFS_FAIL_GNI_FIND_TARGET        0xf02b
00070 #define CFS_FAIL_GNI_WC_DGRAM_FREE      0xf02c
00071 #define CFS_FAIL_GNI_DROP_CLOSING       0xf02d
00072 #define CFS_FAIL_GNI_RX_CLOSE_CLOSING   0xf02e
00073 #define CFS_FAIL_GNI_RX_CLOSE_CLOSED    0xf02f
00074 #define CFS_FAIL_GNI_EP_POST            0xf030
00075 #define CFS_FAIL_GNI_PACK_SRCNID        0xf031
00076 #define CFS_FAIL_GNI_PACK_DSTNID        0xf032
00077 #define CFS_FAIL_GNI_PROBE_WAIT         0xf033
00078 #define CFS_FAIL_GNI_SMSG_CKSUM1        0xf034
00079 #define CFS_FAIL_GNI_SMSG_CKSUM2        0xf035
00080 #define CFS_FAIL_GNI_SMSG_CKSUM3        0xf036
00081 #define CFS_FAIL_GNI_DROP_DESTROY_EP    0xf037
00082 #define CFS_FAIL_GNI_SMSG_GETNEXT       0xf038
00083 #define CFS_FAIL_GNI_FINISH_PURG        0xf039
00084 #define CFS_FAIL_GNI_PURG_REL_DELAY     0xf03a
00085 #define CFS_FAIL_GNI_DONT_NOTIFY        0xf03b
00086 #define CFS_FAIL_GNI_VIRT_SMALL_MAP     0xf03c
00087 #define CFS_FAIL_GNI_DELAY_RDMAQ        0xf03d
00088 #define CFS_FAIL_GNI_PAUSE_SHUTDOWN     0xf03e
00089 #define CFS_FAIL_GNI_PAUSE_DGRAM_COMP   0xf03f
00090 #define CFS_FAIL_GNI_NET_LOOKUP         0xf040
00091 #define CFS_FAIL_GNI_RECV_TIMEOUT       0xf041
00092 #define CFS_FAIL_GNI_SEND_TIMEOUT       0xf042
00093 #define CFS_FAIL_GNI_ONLY_NOOP          0xf043

00095 #define CFS_FAIL_GNI_RACE_RESET         0xf045
00096 #define CFS_FAIL_GNI_GNP_CONNECTING1    0xf046
00097 #define CFS_FAIL_GNI_GNP_CONNECTING2    0xf047
00098 #define CFS_FAIL_GNI_GNP_CONNECTING3    0xf048
00099 #define CFS_FAIL_GNI_SCHEDULE_COMPLETE  0xf049
00100 #define CFS_FAIL_GNI_PUT_ACK_AGAIN      0xf050
00101 #define CFS_FAIL_GNI_GET_REQ_AGAIN      0xf051
00102 #define CFS_FAIL_GNI_SCHED_DEADLINE     0xf052
00103 #define CFS_FAIL_GNI_DGRAM_DEADLINE     0xf053
00104 #define CFS_FAIL_GNI_DGRAM_DROP_TX      0xf054
00105 #define CFS_FAIL_GNI_RDMA_CQ_ERROR      0xf055

00107 /* helper macros */
00108 extern void
00109 _kgnilnd_api_rc_lbug(const char *rcstr, int rc, struct libcfs_debug_msg_data *data,
00110                         const char *fmt, ...)
00111         __attribute__ ((format (printf, 4, 5)));
00112 
00113 #define kgnilnd_api_rc_lbug(msgdata, rc, fmt, a...)                             \
00114 do {                                                                            \
00115         CFS_CHECK_STACK(msgdata, D_ERROR, NULL);                                \
00116         /* we don't mask this - it is always at D_ERROR */                      \
00117         _kgnilnd_api_rc_lbug(kgnilnd_api_rc2str(rc), (rc), msgdata, fmt, ##a);  \
00118 } while (0)
00119 
00120 #define DO_RETCODE(x) case x: return #x;
00121 static inline const char *
00122 kgnilnd_api_rc2str(gni_return_t rrc)
00123 {
00124 
00125         switch (rrc) {
00126                 DO_RETCODE(GNI_RC_SUCCESS)
00127                 DO_RETCODE(GNI_RC_NOT_DONE);
00128                 DO_RETCODE(GNI_RC_INVALID_PARAM);
00129                 DO_RETCODE(GNI_RC_ERROR_RESOURCE);
00130                 DO_RETCODE(GNI_RC_TIMEOUT);
00131                 DO_RETCODE(GNI_RC_PERMISSION_ERROR);
00132                 DO_RETCODE(GNI_RC_DESCRIPTOR_ERROR);
00133                 DO_RETCODE(GNI_RC_ALIGNMENT_ERROR);
00134                 DO_RETCODE(GNI_RC_INVALID_STATE);
00135                 DO_RETCODE(GNI_RC_NO_MATCH);
00136                 DO_RETCODE(GNI_RC_SIZE_ERROR);
00137                 DO_RETCODE(GNI_RC_TRANSACTION_ERROR);
00138                 DO_RETCODE(GNI_RC_ILLEGAL_OP);
00139                 DO_RETCODE(GNI_RC_ERROR_NOMEM);
00140         }
00141         LBUG();
00142 }
00143 #undef DO_RETCODE
00144 
00145 /* log an error and LBUG for unhandled rc from gni api function
00146  * the fmt should be something like:
00147  *  gni_api_call(arg1, arg2, arg3)
00148  */
00149 
00150 /* apick_fn and apick_fmt should be defined for each site */
00151 #undef apick_fn
00152 #undef apick_fmt
00153 
00154 #define GNILND_API_RC_LBUG(args...)                                             \
00155 do {                                                                            \
00156         LIBCFS_DEBUG_MSG_DATA_DECL(msgdata, D_ERROR, NULL);                     \
00157         kgnilnd_api_rc_lbug(&msgdata, rrc, apick_fn"("apick_fmt")", ##args);    \
00158 } while (0)
00159 
00160 #define GNILND_API_SWBUG(args...)                                               \
00161 do {                                                                            \
00162         CERROR("likely SOFTWARE BUG "apick_fn"("apick_fmt") rc %s\n",           \
00163                  ##args, kgnilnd_api_rc2str(rrc));                              \
00164 } while (0)
00165 
00166 #define GNILND_API_EINVAL(args...)                                              \
00167 do {                                                                            \
00168         CERROR("invalid parameter to "apick_fn"("apick_fmt") rc %s\n",          \
00169                  ##args, kgnilnd_api_rc2str(rrc));                              \
00170 } while (0)
00171 
00172 #define GNILND_API_RESOURCE(args...)                                            \
00173 do {                                                                            \
00174         CERROR("no resources for "apick_fn"("apick_fmt") rc %s\n",              \
00175                 ##args, kgnilnd_api_rc2str(rrc));                               \
00176 } while (0)
00177 
00178 #define GNILND_API_BUSY(args...)                                                \
00179 do {                                                                            \
00180         CERROR("resources busy for "apick_fn"("apick_fmt") rc %s\n",            \
00181                 ##args, kgnilnd_api_rc2str(rrc));                               \
00182 } while (0)
00183 
00184 #undef DEBUG_SMSG_CREDITS
00185 #ifdef DEBUG_SMSG_CREDITS
00186 #define CRAY_CONFIG_GHAL_GEMINI
00187 #include <gni_priv.h>
00188 #define GNIDBG_SMSG_CREDS(level, conn)                                        \
00189 do {                                                                          \
00190         gni_ep_smsg_mbox_t *smsg = conn->gnc_ephandle->smsg;                  \
00191         CDEBUG(level, "SMSGDBG: conn %p mcred %d/%d bcred %d/%d "             \
00192                 "s_seq %d/%d/%d r_seq %d/%d/%d retr %d\n",                    \
00193                 conn, smsg->mbox_credits, smsg->back_mbox_credits,            \
00194                 smsg->buffer_credits, smsg->back_buffer_credits,              \
00195                 smsg->s_seqno, smsg->s_seqno_back_mbox_credits,               \
00196                 smsg->s_seqno_back_buffer_credits, smsg->r_seqno,             \
00197                 smsg->r_seqno_back_mbox_credits,                              \
00198                 smsg->r_seqno_back_buffer_credits, smsg->retransmit_count);   \
00199 } while (0)
00200 #else
00201 #define GNIDBG_SMSG_CREDS(level, conn) do {} while(0)
00202 #endif
00203 
00204 /* these are all wrappers around gni_XXX functions.
00205  * This allows us to handle all the return codes and api checks without
00206  * dirtying up the logic code */
00207 
00208 /* TODO: RETURN wrapper that translates integer to GNI API RC string */
00209 
00210 #define apick_fn "kgnilnd_cdm_create"
00211 #define apick_fmt "%u, %u, %u, %u, 0x%p"
00212 static inline gni_return_t kgnilnd_cdm_create(
00213                 IN uint32_t             inst_id,
00214                 IN uint8_t              ptag,
00215                 IN uint32_t             cookie,
00216                 IN uint32_t             modes,
00217                 OUT gni_cdm_handle_t    *cdm_hndl
00218                 )
00219 {
00220         gni_return_t rrc;
00221 
00222         /* Error injection */
00223         if (CFS_FAIL_CHECK(CFS_FAIL_GNI_CDM_CREATE)) {
00224                 rrc = cfs_fail_val ? cfs_fail_val : GNI_RC_INVALID_PARAM;
00225         } else {
00226                 rrc = gni_cdm_create(inst_id, ptag, cookie, modes, cdm_hndl);
00227         }
00228 
00229         switch (rrc)  {
00230         case GNI_RC_SUCCESS:
00231                 break;
00232         case GNI_RC_ERROR_RESOURCE:
00233         case GNI_RC_INVALID_PARAM:
00234                 /* Try to bail gracefully */
00235                 GNILND_API_SWBUG(
00236                         inst_id, ptag, cookie, modes, cdm_hndl);
00237                 break;
00238         default:
00239                 GNILND_API_RC_LBUG(
00240                         inst_id, ptag, cookie, modes, cdm_hndl);
00241 
00242                 /* LBUG never returns, but just for style and consistency */
00243                 break;
00244         }
00245         RETURN(rrc);
00246 }
00247 
00248 #undef apick_fn
00249 #undef apick_fmt
00250 
00251 #define apick_fn "kgnilnd_cdm_attach"
00252 #define apick_fmt "0x%p, %u, 0x%p, 0x%p"
00253 static inline gni_return_t kgnilnd_cdm_attach(
00254                 IN gni_cdm_handle_t     cdm_hndl,
00255                 IN uint32_t             device_id,
00256                 OUT uint32_t            *local_addr,
00257                 OUT gni_nic_handle_t    *nic_hndl
00258                 )
00259 {
00260         gni_return_t rrc;
00261 
00262         /* Error injection */
00263         if (CFS_FAIL_CHECK(CFS_FAIL_GNI_CDM_ATTACH)) {
00264                 rrc = cfs_fail_val ? cfs_fail_val : GNI_RC_INVALID_PARAM;
00265         } else {
00266                 rrc = gni_cdm_attach(cdm_hndl, device_id, local_addr, nic_hndl);
00267         }
00268 
00269         switch (rrc)  {
00270         case GNI_RC_SUCCESS:
00271                 break;
00272         case GNI_RC_NO_MATCH:
00273         case GNI_RC_INVALID_PARAM:
00274                 GNILND_API_SWBUG(
00275                         cdm_hndl, device_id, local_addr, nic_hndl);
00276                 break;
00277         case GNI_RC_ERROR_RESOURCE:
00278         case GNI_RC_INVALID_STATE:
00279                 GNILND_API_RESOURCE(
00280                         cdm_hndl, device_id, local_addr, nic_hndl);
00281                 break;
00282         default:
00283                 GNILND_API_RC_LBUG(
00284                         cdm_hndl, device_id, local_addr, nic_hndl);
00285 
00286                 /* LBUG never returns, but just for style and consistency */
00287                 break;
00288         }
00289         RETURN(rrc);
00290 }
00291 #undef apick_fmt
00292 #undef apick_fn
00293 
00294 #define apick_fn "kgnilnd_cdm_destroy"
00295 #define apick_fmt "0x%p"
00296 static inline gni_return_t kgnilnd_cdm_destroy(
00297                 IN gni_cdm_handle_t     cdm_hndl
00298                 )
00299 {
00300         gni_return_t rrc;
00301 
00302         /* Error injection */
00303         if (CFS_FAIL_CHECK(CFS_FAIL_GNI_CQ_DESTROY)) {
00304                 rrc = cfs_fail_val ? cfs_fail_val : GNI_RC_INVALID_PARAM;
00305         } else {
00306                 rrc = gni_cdm_destroy(
00307                         cdm_hndl);
00308         }
00309 
00310         switch (rrc)  {
00311         case GNI_RC_SUCCESS:
00312                 break;
00313         case GNI_RC_INVALID_PARAM:
00314                 GNILND_API_SWBUG(
00315                         cdm_hndl);
00316                 break;
00317         default:
00318                 GNILND_API_RC_LBUG(
00319                         cdm_hndl);
00320 
00321                 /* LBUG never returns, but just for style and consistency */
00322                 break;
00323         }
00324         RETURN(rrc);
00325 }
00326 #undef apick_fn
00327 #undef apick_fmt

00329 #define apick_fn "kgnilnd_subscribe_errors"
00330 #define apick_fmt "0x%p,%x,%u,0x%p,0x%p,0x%p"
00331 static inline gni_return_t kgnilnd_subscribe_errors(
00332                 IN gni_nic_handle_t  nic_handle,
00333                 IN gni_error_mask_t  mask,
00334                 IN uint32_t          EEQ_size,
00335                 IN void              (*EQ_new_event)(gni_err_handle_t),
00336                 IN void              (*app_crit_err)(gni_err_handle_t),
00337                 OUT gni_err_handle_t *err_handle
00338                 )
00339 {
00340         gni_return_t rrc;
00341 
00342         /* Error injection */
00343         if (CFS_FAIL_CHECK(CFS_FAIL_GNI_ERR_SUBSCRIBE)) {
00344                 rrc = cfs_fail_val ? cfs_fail_val : GNI_RC_INVALID_PARAM;
00345         } else {
00346                 rrc = gni_subscribe_errors(
00347                         nic_handle, mask, EEQ_size, EQ_new_event, app_crit_err,
00348                         err_handle);
00349         }
00350 
00351         switch (rrc)  {
00352         case GNI_RC_SUCCESS:
00353                 break;
00354         case GNI_RC_INVALID_PARAM:
00355                 GNILND_API_SWBUG(
00356                         nic_handle, mask, EEQ_size, EQ_new_event, app_crit_err,
00357                         err_handle);
00358                 break;
00359         case GNI_RC_ERROR_RESOURCE:
00360                 GNILND_API_RESOURCE(
00361                         nic_handle, mask, EEQ_size, EQ_new_event, app_crit_err,
00362                         err_handle);
00363                 break;
00364         default:
00365                 GNILND_API_RC_LBUG(
00366                         nic_handle, mask, EEQ_size, EQ_new_event, app_crit_err,
00367                         err_handle);
00368                 /* LBUG never returns, but just for style and consistency */
00369                 break;
00370         }
00371         RETURN(rrc);
00372 }
00373 #undef apick_fn
00374 #undef apick_fmt
00375 
00376 #define apick_fn "kgnilnd_release_errors"
00377 #define apick_fmt "0x%p"
00378 static inline gni_return_t kgnilnd_release_errors(
00379                 IN gni_err_handle_t err_handle
00380                 )
00381 {
00382         gni_return_t rrc;
00383 
00384         rrc = gni_release_errors(
00385                         err_handle);
00386 
00387         switch (rrc)  {
00388         case GNI_RC_SUCCESS:
00389                 break;
00390         case GNI_RC_INVALID_PARAM:
00391         case GNI_RC_NOT_DONE:
00392                 GNILND_API_SWBUG(
00393                         err_handle);
00394                 break;
00395         default:
00396                 GNILND_API_RC_LBUG(
00397                         err_handle);
00398                 /* LBUG never returns, but just for style and consistency */
00399                 break;
00400         }
00401         RETURN(rrc);
00402 }
00403 #undef apick_fn
00404 #undef apick_fmt
00405 
00406 #define apick_fn "kgnilnd_set_quiesce_callback"
00407 #define apick_fmt "0x%p,0x%p"
00408 static inline gni_return_t kgnilnd_set_quiesce_callback(
00409                 IN gni_nic_handle_t  nic_handle,
00410                 IN void              (*qsce_func)(gni_nic_handle_t, uint64_t msecs)
00411                 )
00412 {
00413         gni_return_t rrc;
00414 
00415         /* Error injection */
00416         if (CFS_FAIL_CHECK(CFS_FAIL_GNI_REG_QUIESCE)) {
00417                 rrc = cfs_fail_val ? cfs_fail_val : GNI_RC_INVALID_PARAM;
00418         } else {
00419                 rrc = gni_set_quiesce_callback(
00420                         nic_handle, qsce_func);
00421         }
00422 
00423         switch (rrc)  {
00424         case GNI_RC_SUCCESS:
00425                 break;
00426         case GNI_RC_INVALID_STATE:
00427         case GNI_RC_INVALID_PARAM:
00428                 GNILND_API_SWBUG(
00429                         nic_handle, qsce_func);
00430                 break;
00431         default:
00432                 GNILND_API_RC_LBUG(
00433                         nic_handle, qsce_func);
00434                 /* LBUG never returns, but just for style and consistency */
00435                 break;
00436         }
00437         RETURN(rrc);
00438 }
00439 #undef apick_fn
00440 #undef apick_fmt
00441 
00442 #define apick_fn "kgnilnd_get_quiesce_status"
00443 #define apick_fmt "0x%p"
00444 static inline gni_return_t kgnilnd_get_quiesce_status(
00445                 IN gni_nic_handle_t  nic_handle
00446                 )
00447 {
00448         uint32_t rrc;
00449 
00450         /* this has weird RC -
00451          * 0 - quiesce not in progress
00452          * 1 - quiesce is turned on
00453         */
00454 
00455         /* Error injection */
00456         if (CFS_FAIL_CHECK(CFS_FAIL_GNI_IN_QUIESCE)) {
00457                 rrc = 1;
00458         } else {
00459                 rrc = gni_get_quiesce_status(
00460                         nic_handle);
00461         }
00462 
00463         switch (rrc)  {
00464         case 1:
00465         case 0:
00466                 break;
00467         default:
00468                 GNILND_API_RC_LBUG(
00469                         nic_handle);
00470                 /* LBUG never returns, but just for style and consistency */
00471                 break;
00472         }
00473         RETURN(rrc);
00474 }
00475 #undef apick_fn
00476 #undef apick_fmt
00477 
00478 #define apick_fn "kgnilnd_cq_create"
00479 #define apick_fmt "0x%p, %u, %u, 0x%p, "LPX64", 0x%p"
00480 static inline gni_return_t kgnilnd_cq_create(
00481                 IN gni_nic_handle_t     nic_hndl,
00482                 IN uint32_t             entry_count,
00483                 IN uint32_t             delay_index,
00484                 IN gni_cq_event_hndlr_f *event_handler,
00485                 IN uint64_t             usr_event_data,
00486                 OUT gni_cq_handle_t     *cq_hndl
00487                 )
00488 {
00489         gni_return_t rrc;
00490 
00491         /* Error injection */
00492         if (CFS_FAIL_CHECK(CFS_FAIL_GNI_CQ_CREATE)) {
00493                 rrc = cfs_fail_val ? cfs_fail_val : GNI_RC_INVALID_PARAM;
00494         } else {
00495                 rrc = gni_cq_create(
00496                        nic_hndl, entry_count, delay_index, event_handler,
00497                         usr_event_data, cq_hndl);
00498         }
00499 
00500         switch (rrc)  {
00501         case GNI_RC_SUCCESS:
00502                 break;
00503         case GNI_RC_INVALID_PARAM:
00504                 GNILND_API_SWBUG(
00505                         nic_hndl, entry_count, delay_index, event_handler,
00506                         usr_event_data, cq_hndl);
00507                 break;
00508         case GNI_RC_ERROR_RESOURCE:
00509                 GNILND_API_RESOURCE(
00510                         nic_hndl, entry_count, delay_index, event_handler,
00511                         usr_event_data, cq_hndl);
00512                 break;
00513         default:
00514                 GNILND_API_RC_LBUG(
00515                         nic_hndl, entry_count, delay_index, event_handler,
00516                         usr_event_data, cq_hndl);
00517 
00518                 /* LBUG never returns, but just for style and consistency */
00519                 break;
00520         }
00521         RETURN(rrc);
00522 }
00523 #undef apick_fn
00524 #undef apick_fmt
00525 
00526 #define apick_fn "kgnilnd_cq_destroy"
00527 #define apick_fmt "0x%p"
00528 static inline gni_return_t kgnilnd_cq_destroy(
00529                 IN gni_cq_handle_t cq_hndl
00530                 )
00531 {
00532         gni_return_t rrc;
00533 
00534         /* Error injection */
00535         if (CFS_FAIL_CHECK(CFS_FAIL_GNI_CQ_DESTROY)) {
00536                 rrc = cfs_fail_val ? cfs_fail_val : GNI_RC_INVALID_PARAM;
00537         } else {
00538 
00539                 rrc = gni_cq_destroy(
00540                         cq_hndl);
00541         }
00542 
00543         switch (rrc)  {
00544         case GNI_RC_SUCCESS:
00545                 break;
00546         case GNI_RC_INVALID_PARAM:
00547                 GNILND_API_SWBUG(
00548                         cq_hndl);
00549                 break;
00550         case GNI_RC_ERROR_RESOURCE:
00551                 GNILND_API_BUSY(
00552                         cq_hndl);
00553                 break;
00554         default:
00555                 GNILND_API_RC_LBUG(
00556                         cq_hndl);
00557 
00558                 /* LBUG never returns, but just for style and consistency */
00559                 break;
00560         }
00561         RETURN(rrc);
00562 }
00563 #undef apick_fn
00564 #undef apick_fmt
00565 
00566 #define apick_fn "kgnilnd_cq_get_event"
00567 #define apick_fmt "0x%p, 0x%p"
00568 static inline gni_return_t kgnilnd_cq_get_event(
00569                 IN gni_cq_handle_t cq_hndl,
00570                 OUT gni_cq_entry_t *event_data
00571                 )
00572 {
00573         gni_return_t rrc;
00574 
00575         /* no error injection - CQs are touchy about the data.
00576          * where appropriate, we'll do this on the CQs that should be able to
00577          * handle the various errors */
00578         rrc = gni_cq_get_event(
00579                         cq_hndl, event_data);
00580 
00581         switch (rrc)  {
00582         case GNI_RC_SUCCESS:
00583         case GNI_RC_NOT_DONE:
00584         case GNI_RC_TRANSACTION_ERROR:
00585                 break;
00586         case GNI_RC_ERROR_RESOURCE:
00587                 LASSERTF(GNI_CQ_OVERRUN(*event_data),
00588                          "kgni returned ERROR_RESOURCE but cq_hndl 0x%p is not "
00589                          "overrun\n", cq_hndl);
00590                 break;
00591         case GNI_RC_INVALID_PARAM:
00592                 GNILND_API_SWBUG(
00593                         cq_hndl, event_data);
00594                 break;
00595         default:
00596                 GNILND_API_RC_LBUG(
00597                         cq_hndl, event_data);
00598 
00599                 /* LBUG never returns, but just for style and consistency */
00600                 break;
00601         }
00602         return rrc;
00603 }
00604 #undef apick_fn
00605 #undef apick_fmt
00606 
00607 #define apick_fn "kgnilnd_smsg_init"
00608 #define apick_fmt "0x%p, 0x%p, 0x%p"
00609 static inline gni_return_t kgnilnd_smsg_init(
00610                 IN gni_ep_handle_t      ep_hndl,
00611                 IN gni_smsg_attr_t      *local_smsg_attr,
00612                 IN gni_smsg_attr_t      *remote_smsg_attr
00613                 )
00614 {
00615         gni_return_t rrc;
00616 
00617         /* Error injection */
00618         if (CFS_FAIL_CHECK(CFS_FAIL_GNI_SMSG_INIT)) {
00619                 rrc = cfs_fail_val ? cfs_fail_val : GNI_RC_ERROR_RESOURCE;
00620         } else {
00621                 rrc = gni_smsg_init(
00622                         ep_hndl, local_smsg_attr, remote_smsg_attr);
00623         }
00624 
00625         switch (rrc)  {
00626         /* both of these are OK, upper SW needs to handle */
00627         case GNI_RC_SUCCESS:
00628         case GNI_RC_NOT_DONE:
00629                 break;
00630         case GNI_RC_INVALID_PARAM:
00631         case GNI_RC_INVALID_STATE:
00632                 GNILND_API_SWBUG(
00633                         ep_hndl, local_smsg_attr, remote_smsg_attr);
00634                 break;
00635         case GNI_RC_ERROR_RESOURCE:
00636                 GNILND_API_RESOURCE(
00637                         ep_hndl, local_smsg_attr, remote_smsg_attr);
00638                 break;
00639         default:
00640                 GNILND_API_RC_LBUG(
00641                         ep_hndl, local_smsg_attr, remote_smsg_attr);
00642 
00643                 /* LBUG never returns, but just for style and consistency */
00644                 break;
00645         }
00646         RETURN(rrc);
00647 }
00648 #undef apick_fn
00649 #undef apick_fmt
00650 
00651 #define apick_fn "kgnilnd_smsg_send"
00652 #define apick_fmt "0x%p, 0x%p, %d, 0x%p, %u %u"
00653 static inline gni_return_t kgnilnd_smsg_send(
00654                 IN gni_ep_handle_t      ep_hndl,
00655                 IN void                 *header,
00656                 IN uint32_t             header_length,
00657                 IN void                 *data,
00658                 IN uint32_t             data_length,
00659                 IN uint32_t             msg_id
00660                 )
00661 {
00662         gni_return_t rrc;
00663 
00664         /* Error injection */
00665         if (CFS_FAIL_CHECK(CFS_FAIL_GNI_SMSG_SEND)) {
00666                 if (cfs_fail_loc & CFS_FAIL_RAND) {
00667                         rrc = GNI_RC_NOT_DONE;
00668                 } else {
00669                         rrc = cfs_fail_val ? cfs_fail_val : GNI_RC_NOT_DONE;
00670                 }
00671         } else {
00672                 rrc = gni_smsg_send(
00673                         ep_hndl, header, header_length, data, data_length, msg_id);
00674         }
00675 
00676         switch (rrc)  {
00677         /* both of these are OK, upper SW needs to handle */
00678         case GNI_RC_SUCCESS:
00679         case GNI_RC_NOT_DONE:
00680                 break;
00681         case GNI_RC_INVALID_PARAM:
00682                 GNILND_API_SWBUG(
00683                         ep_hndl, header, header_length, data, data_length, msg_id);
00684                 break;
00685         case GNI_RC_ERROR_RESOURCE:
00686                 GNILND_API_RESOURCE(
00687                         ep_hndl, header, header_length, data, data_length, msg_id);
00688                 break;
00689         default:
00690                 GNILND_API_RC_LBUG(
00691                         ep_hndl, header, header_length, data, data_length, msg_id);
00692 
00693                 /* LBUG never returns, but just for style and consistency */
00694                 break;
00695         }
00696         RETURN(rrc);
00697 }
00698 #undef apick_fn
00699 #undef apick_fmt
00700

00966 #define apick_fn "kgnilnd_ep_postdata_w_id"
00967 #define apick_fmt "0x%p, 0x%p, %d, 0x%p, %d, "LPU64""
00968 static inline gni_return_t kgnilnd_ep_postdata_w_id(
00969                 IN gni_ep_handle_t ep_hndl,
00970                 IN void            *in_data,
00971                 IN uint16_t        data_len,
00972                 IN void            *out_buf,
00973                 IN uint16_t        buf_size,
00974                 IN uint64_t        datagram_id
00975                 )
00976 {
00977         gni_return_t rrc;
00978 
00979         /* Error injection */
00980         if (CFS_FAIL_CHECK(CFS_FAIL_GNI_EP_POST)) {

00982         } else {
00983                 rrc = gni_ep_postdata_w_id(
00984                         ep_hndl, in_data, data_len, out_buf, buf_size,
00985                         datagram_id);
00986         }
00987 
00988         switch (rrc)  {
00989         case GNI_RC_SUCCESS:
00990         case GNI_RC_ERROR_NOMEM:
00991         case GNI_RC_ERROR_RESOURCE:
00992                 break;
00993         case GNI_RC_INVALID_PARAM:
00994         case GNI_RC_SIZE_ERROR:
00995                 GNILND_API_SWBUG(
00996                         ep_hndl, in_data, data_len, out_buf, buf_size,
00997                         datagram_id);
00998                 break;
00999         default:
01000                 GNILND_API_RC_LBUG(
01001                         ep_hndl, in_data, data_len, out_buf, buf_size,
01002                         datagram_id);
01003 
01004                 /* LBUG never returns, but just for style and consistency */
01005                 break;
01006         }
01007         RETURN(rrc);
01008 }
01009 #undef apick_fn
01010 #undef apick_fmt
01011 
01012 #define apick_fn "kgnilnd_ep_postdata_test_by_id"
01013 #define apick_fmt "0x%p, "LPU64", 0x%p, 0x%p, 0x%p"
01014 static inline gni_return_t kgnilnd_ep_postdata_test_by_id(
01015                 IN gni_ep_handle_t      ep_hndl,
01016                 IN uint64_t             datagram_id,
01017                 OUT gni_post_state_t    *post_state,
01018                 OUT uint32_t            *remote_addr,
01019                 OUT uint32_t            *remote_id
01020                 )
01021 {
01022         gni_return_t rrc;
01023 
01024         /* Error injection */
01025         if (CFS_FAIL_CHECK(CFS_FAIL_GNI_EP_TEST)) {
01026                 rrc = cfs_fail_val ? cfs_fail_val : GNI_RC_ERROR_NOMEM;
01027         } else {
01028                 rrc = gni_ep_postdata_test_by_id(
01029                         ep_hndl, datagram_id, post_state, remote_addr,
01030                         remote_id);
01031 
01032                 /* we want to lie, but we need to do the actual work first
01033                  * so we don't keep getting the event saying a dgram is ready */
01034                 if (rrc == GNI_RC_SUCCESS && CFS_FAIL_CHECK(CFS_FAIL_GNI_DG_TERMINATE)) {
01035                         /* don't use fail_val, allows us to do FAIL_SOME */
01036                         *post_state = GNI_POST_TERMINATED;
01037                 }
01038         }
01039 
01040         switch (rrc)  {
01041         case GNI_RC_SUCCESS:
01042         case GNI_RC_NO_MATCH:
01043                 break;
01044         case GNI_RC_SIZE_ERROR:
01045         case GNI_RC_INVALID_PARAM:
01046                 GNILND_API_SWBUG(
01047                         ep_hndl, datagram_id, post_state, remote_addr,
01048                         remote_id);
01049                 break;
01050         case GNI_RC_ERROR_NOMEM:
01051                 GNILND_API_RESOURCE(
01052                         ep_hndl, datagram_id, post_state, remote_addr,
01053                         remote_id);
01054                 break;
01055         default:
01056                 GNILND_API_RC_LBUG(
01057                         ep_hndl, datagram_id, post_state, remote_addr,
01058                         remote_id);
01059 
01060                 /* LBUG never returns, but just for style and consistency */
01061                 break;
01062         }
01063         RETURN(rrc);
01064 }
01065 #undef apick_fn
01066 #undef apick_fmt
01067 
01068 #define apick_fn "kgnilnd_ep_postdata_cancel_by_id"
01069 #define apick_fmt "0x%p, "LPU64""

01087                 GNILND_API_SWBUG(
01088                         ep_hndl, datagram_id);
01089                 break;
01090         default:
01091                 GNILND_API_RC_LBUG(
01092                         ep_hndl, datagram_id);
01093 
01094                 /* LBUG never returns, but just for style and consistency */

01139 #define apick_fn "kgnilnd_postdata_probe_wait_by_id"
01140 #define apick_fmt "0x%p, %d, 0x%p"
01141 static inline gni_return_t kgnilnd_postdata_probe_wait_by_id(
01142                 IN gni_nic_handle_t nic_hndl,
01143                 IN uint32_t         timeout,
01144                 OUT uint64_t        *datagram_id
01145                 )
01146 {
01147         gni_return_t rrc;
01148 
01149         /* Error injection */
01150         if (CFS_FAIL_CHECK(CFS_FAIL_GNI_PROBE_WAIT)) {
01151                 rrc = cfs_fail_val ? cfs_fail_val : GNI_RC_TIMEOUT;
01152         } else {
01153                 rrc = gni_postdata_probe_wait_by_id(
01154                         nic_hndl, timeout, datagram_id);
01155         }
01156 
01157         switch (rrc)  {
01158         case GNI_RC_SUCCESS:
01159         case GNI_RC_TIMEOUT:
01160                 break;
01161         case GNI_RC_INVALID_PARAM:
01162                 GNILND_API_SWBUG(
01163                         nic_hndl, timeout, datagram_id);
01164                 break;
01165         default:
01166                 GNILND_API_RC_LBUG(
01167                         nic_hndl, timeout, datagram_id);
01168 
01169                 /* LBUG never returns, but just for style and consistency */
01170                 break;
01171         }
01172         RETURN(rrc);
01173 }
01174 #undef apick_fn
01175 #undef apick_fmt
01176 
01177 #define apick_fn "kgnilnd_post_rdma"
01178 #define apick_fmt "0x%p, 0x%p"
01179 static inline gni_return_t kgnilnd_post_rdma(
01180                 IN gni_ep_handle_t               ep_hndl,
01181                 IN gni_post_descriptor_t        *post_descr
01182                 )
01183 {
01184         gni_return_t rrc;
01185 
01186         /* Error injection */
01187         if (CFS_FAIL_CHECK(CFS_FAIL_GNI_POST_RDMA)) {
01188                 rrc = cfs_fail_val ? cfs_fail_val : GNI_RC_INVALID_PARAM;
01189         } else {
01190                 rrc = gni_post_rdma(
01191                         ep_hndl, post_descr);
01192         }
01193 
01194         switch (rrc)  {
01195         case GNI_RC_SUCCESS:
01196                 break;
01197         case GNI_RC_ALIGNMENT_ERROR:
01198         case GNI_RC_INVALID_PARAM:
01199                 GNILND_API_SWBUG(
01200                         ep_hndl, post_descr);
01201                 break;
01202         case GNI_RC_ERROR_RESOURCE:
01203                 CDEBUG(D_NET, "no resources for kgnilnd_post_rdma (0x%p, 0x%p)"
01204                         " rc %s\n", ep_hndl, post_descr,
01205                         kgnilnd_api_rc2str(rrc));
01206                 break;
01207         default:
01208                 GNILND_API_RC_LBUG(
01209                         ep_hndl, post_descr);
01210 
01211                 /* LBUG never returns, but just for style and consistency */
01212                 break;
01213         }
01214         RETURN(rrc);
01215 }
01216 #undef apick_fn
01217 #undef apick_fmt
01218 
01219 #define apick_fn "kgnilnd_get_completed"
01220 #define apick_fmt "0x%p,"LPX64",0x%p"
01221 static inline gni_return_t kgnilnd_get_completed(
01222                 IN gni_cq_handle_t              cq_hndl,
01223                 IN gni_cq_entry_t               event_data,
01224                 OUT gni_post_descriptor_t       **post_descr
01225                 )
01226 {
01227         gni_return_t rrc;
01228 
01229 
01230         rrc = gni_get_completed(cq_hndl, event_data, post_descr);
01231 
01232         switch (rrc)  {
01233         case GNI_RC_TRANSACTION_ERROR:
01234         case GNI_RC_SUCCESS:
01235                 break;
01236         case GNI_RC_DESCRIPTOR_ERROR:
01237         case GNI_RC_INVALID_PARAM:
01238                 GNILND_API_SWBUG(cq_hndl, event_data, post_descr);
01239                 break;
01240         default:
01241                 GNILND_API_RC_LBUG(cq_hndl, event_data, post_descr);
01242                 /* LBUG never returns, but just for style and consistency */
01243                 break;
01244         }
01245 
01246         /* Error injection - we need a valid desc, so let kgni give us one
01247          * - then we lie  */
01248         if (rrc == GNI_RC_SUCCESS &&
01249             (CFS_FAIL_CHECK(CFS_FAIL_GNI_GET_COMPLETED))) {
01250                 /* We only trigger TRANSACTION_ERROR for now */
01251                 gni_post_descriptor_t *desc;
01252                 rrc = GNI_RC_TRANSACTION_ERROR;
01253                 desc = *post_descr;
01254                 desc->status = rrc;
01255                 /* recoverable decision made from cfs_fail_val in
01256                  *  kgnilnd_cq_error_str and
01257                  *  kgnilnd_cq_error_recoverable */
01258         }
01259         RETURN(rrc);
01260 }
01261 #undef apick_fn
01262 #undef apick_fmt
01263 
01264 #define apick_fn "kgnilnd_cq_error_str"
01265 #define apick_fmt LPX64",0x%p,%d"
01266 static inline gni_return_t kgnilnd_cq_error_str(
01267                 IN gni_cq_entry_t       entry,
01268                 IN void                *buffer,
01269                 IN uint32_t             len
01270                 )
01271 {
01272         gni_return_t rrc;
01273 
01274         /* Error injection - set string if we injected a
01275          *  TRANSACTION_ERROR earlier */
01276         if (CFS_FAIL_CHECK(CFS_FAIL_GNI_GET_COMPLETED)) {
01277                 /* if we just set persistent error, we can't ever
01278                  * break in via ssh to clear, so use a count > 10 to indicate fatal */
01279                 sprintf(buffer, "INJECT:%s", cfs_fail_val > 10 ?
01280                         "FATAL" : "RECOVERABLE");
01281                 rrc = GNI_RC_SUCCESS;
01282         } else {
01283                 rrc = gni_cq_error_str(
01284                         entry, buffer, len);
01285         }
01286 
01287         switch (rrc)  {
01288         case GNI_RC_SUCCESS:
01289                 break;
01290         case GNI_RC_SIZE_ERROR:
01291         case GNI_RC_INVALID_PARAM:
01292                 GNILND_API_SWBUG(
01293                         entry, buffer, len);
01294                 /* give them something to use */
01295                 snprintf(buffer, len, "UNDEF:UNDEF");
01296                 break;
01297         default:
01298                 GNILND_API_RC_LBUG(
01299                         entry, buffer, len);
01300 
01301                 /* LBUG never returns, but just for style and consistency */
01302                 break;
01303         }
01304         RETURN(rrc);
01305 }
01306 #undef apick_fn
01307 #undef apick_fmt
01308 
01309 #define apick_fn "kgnilnd_cq_error_recoverable"
01310 #define apick_fmt LPX64",0x%p"
01311 static inline gni_return_t kgnilnd_cq_error_recoverable(
01312                 IN gni_cq_entry_t       entry,
01313                 IN uint32_t            *recoverable
01314                 )
01315 {
01316         gni_return_t rrc;
01317 
01318         /* Error injection - set string if we injected a
01319          *  TRANSACTION_ERROR earlier */
01320         if (CFS_FAIL_CHECK(CFS_FAIL_GNI_GET_COMPLETED)) {
01321                 *recoverable = cfs_fail_val > 10 ? 0 : 1;
01322                 rrc = GNI_RC_SUCCESS;
01323         } else {
01324                 rrc = gni_cq_error_recoverable(
01325                         entry, recoverable);
01326         }
01327 
01328         switch (rrc)  {
01329         case GNI_RC_SUCCESS:
01330                 break;
01331         case GNI_RC_INVALID_STATE:
01332         case GNI_RC_INVALID_PARAM:
01333                 GNILND_API_SWBUG(
01334                         entry, recoverable);
01335                 *recoverable = 0;
01336                 break;
01337         default:
01338                 GNILND_API_RC_LBUG(
01339                         entry, recoverable);
01340 
01341                 /* LBUG never returns, but just for style and consistency */
01342                 break;
01343         }
01344         RETURN(rrc);
01345 }
01346 #undef apick_fn
01347 #undef apick_fmt
01348 
01349 #define apick_fn "kgnilnd_mem_register_segments"
01350 #define apick_fmt "0x%p,0x%p,%u,0x%p,%x,0x%p"
01351 static inline gni_return_t
01352 kgnilnd_mem_register_segments(
01353                 IN gni_nic_handle_t     nic_hndl,
01354                 IN gni_mem_segment_t    *mem_segments,
01355                 IN uint32_t             segments_cnt,
01356                 IN gni_cq_handle_t      dst_cq_hndl,
01357                 IN uint32_t             flags,
01358                 OUT gni_mem_handle_t    *mem_hndl
01359                 )
01360 {
01361         gni_return_t rrc;
01362 
01363         /* Error injection */
01364         if (CFS_FAIL_CHECK(CFS_FAIL_GNI_PHYS_MAP)) {
01365                 rrc = GNI_RC_ERROR_RESOURCE;
01366         } else {
01367                 rrc = gni_mem_register_segments(
01368                         nic_hndl, mem_segments, segments_cnt,
01369                         dst_cq_hndl, flags, mem_hndl);
01370         }
01371 
01372         switch (rrc)  {
01373         case GNI_RC_SUCCESS:
01374         case GNI_RC_ERROR_RESOURCE:
01375                 break;
01376         case GNI_RC_INVALID_PARAM:
01377                 GNILND_API_SWBUG(
01378                         nic_hndl, mem_segments, segments_cnt,
01379                         dst_cq_hndl, flags, mem_hndl);
01380                 break;
01381         default:
01382                 GNILND_API_RC_LBUG(
01383                         nic_hndl, mem_segments, segments_cnt,
01384                         dst_cq_hndl, flags, mem_hndl);
01385 
01386                 /* LBUG never returns, but just for style and consistency */
01387                 break;
01388         }
01389         RETURN(rrc);
01390 }
01391 #undef apick_fn
01392 #undef apick_fmt
01393 
01394 #define apick_fn "kgnilnd_mem_register"
01395 #define apick_fmt "0x%p,"LPX64","LPX64"0x%p,%u,0x%p"
01396 static inline gni_return_t kgnilnd_mem_register(
01397                 IN gni_nic_handle_t     nic_hndl,
01398                 IN uint64_t             address,
01399                 IN uint64_t             length,
01400                 IN gni_cq_handle_t      dst_cq_hndl,
01401                 IN uint32_t             flags,
01402                 OUT gni_mem_handle_t    *mem_hndl
01403                 )
01404 {
01405         gni_return_t rrc;
01406 
01407         /* Error injection */
01408         if (CFS_FAIL_CHECK(CFS_FAIL_GNI_VIRT_MAP)) {
01409                 rrc = GNI_RC_ERROR_RESOURCE;
01410         } else if (CFS_FAIL_CHECK(CFS_FAIL_GNI_VIRT_SMALL_MAP) &&
01411                    length <= *kgnilnd_tunables.kgn_max_immediate) {
01412                 rrc = GNI_RC_INVALID_PARAM;
01413         } else {
01414                 rrc = gni_mem_register(
01415                         nic_hndl, address, length,
01416                         dst_cq_hndl, flags, mem_hndl);
01417         }
01418 
01419         /* gni_mem_register may return GNI_RC_ERROR_NOMEM under memory
01420          * pressure but the upper layers only know about resource errors
01421          */
01422         if (rrc == GNI_RC_ERROR_NOMEM) {
01423                 rrc = GNI_RC_ERROR_RESOURCE;
01424         }
01425 
01426         switch (rrc)  {
01427         case GNI_RC_SUCCESS:
01428         case GNI_RC_ERROR_RESOURCE:
01429                 break;
01430         case GNI_RC_INVALID_PARAM:
01431                 GNILND_API_SWBUG(
01432                         nic_hndl, address, length,
01433                         dst_cq_hndl, flags, mem_hndl);
01434                 break;
01435         default:
01436                 GNILND_API_RC_LBUG(
01437                         nic_hndl, address, length,
01438                         dst_cq_hndl, flags, mem_hndl);
01439 
01440                 /* LBUG never returns, but just for style and consistency */
01441                 break;
01442         }
01443         RETURN(rrc);
01444 }
01445 #undef apick_fn
01446 #undef apick_fmt
01447 
01448 #define apick_fn "kgnilnd_mem_deregister"
01449 #define apick_fmt "0x%p,0x%p,%d"
01450 static inline gni_return_t kgnilnd_mem_deregister(
01451                 IN gni_nic_handle_t     nic_hndl,
01452                 IN gni_mem_handle_t     *mem_hndl,
01453                 IN int                  hold_timeout
01454                 )
01455 {
01456         gni_return_t rrc;
01457 
01458         /* Error injection */
01459         if (CFS_FAIL_CHECK(CFS_FAIL_GNI_VIRT_UNMAP)) {
01460                 rrc = cfs_fail_val ? cfs_fail_val : GNI_RC_INVALID_PARAM;
01461         } else {
01462                 rrc = gni_mem_deregister(
01463                         nic_hndl, mem_hndl, hold_timeout);
01464         }
01465 
01466         switch (rrc)  {
01467         case GNI_RC_SUCCESS:
01468                 break;
01469         case GNI_RC_INVALID_PARAM:
01470                 GNILND_API_SWBUG(
01471                         nic_hndl, mem_hndl, hold_timeout);
01472                 break;
01473         default:
01474                 GNILND_API_RC_LBUG(
01475                         nic_hndl, mem_hndl, hold_timeout);
01476 
01477                 /* LBUG never returns, but just for style and consistency */
01478                 break;
01479         }
01480         RETURN(rrc);
01481 }
01482 #undef apick_fn
01483 #undef apick_fmt

01487 static inline gni_return_t kgnilnd_mem_mdd_release(

01499                         nic_hndl, mem_hndl);
